title: What to build on urgot with the black cleaver changes?
body:
I have been playing urgot mid lately and this patch suddenly happened, removing brutalizer from Black cleavers build path. As well as changing black cleaver  a whole lot. Could someone give me a build path for him since ghost blade as a completed item might not be as great.

Core items I know so far {{item:3042}} {{item:3110}} {{item:3035}} {{item:3260}}

replies.body: You could still build black cleaver.  Urgot E stacks the passive crazy fast.  And you hit 40% CDR with FH and BC.
Thanks for the comments, Black cleaver is nice still but I really liked the caster/damage brutalizer offered

still black cleaver.

Max CDR, better E shred, more durability, the only thing that is different is you won't rush it anymore but save it for 3rd or 4th item.
You perfectly can built BC, with phage passive you can stick on someone to the E+Q

Yeah no reason not to build black cleaver, frankly despite the slightly lower AD, I think the item is actually even better for him due to that rage passive and extra CDR. In fact I believe reaching 40% CDR allows you to shoot off 5 homing acid hunters per noxian corrosive charge.

Phage is a touch cheaper, and provides some interesting stuff at the cost of something like 5 AD and the CDR. Alternatively you could pick up kindlegem if the CDR is what you're concerned about. I'm almost considering completing cleaver before LW unless there are some majorly tanky people on the other team.
